Average_dSASA.description: Buried surface area at the interface. >800 Å² indicates strong binding.

Average_ShapeComplementarity.description: Interface packing quality. >0.6 is generally good.

Average_dG.description: Binding free energy (kcal/mol). < -10 kcal/mol suggests favorable binding.

Average_n_InterfaceHbonds.description: Number of hydrogen bonds at the interface. More is better.

Average_Hotspot_RMSD.description: RMSD of hotspot residues. < 2 Å indicates good alignment.

Average_Relaxed_Clashes.description: Steric clashes (relaxed/unrelaxed). Should be near zero.

Average_PackStat.description: Packing quality score. >0.5 suggests proper side-chain packing.

Average_pLDDT.description: Per-residue confidence score. >0.9 is very reliable.

Average_Binder_pLDDT.description: Binder residue confidence score. >0.9 very reliable.

Average_i_pAE.description: Interface-specific pAE (normalized). Lower is better; ≤ 3 Å raw.

Average_pAE.description: Predicted Alignment Error (normalized). Lower is better; ≤5 Å raw.

Average_pTM.description: Predicted TM-score. >0.7 suggests reliable global fold.
